comment._content: It says Keating on the photo, but Hartzell on the caption (?)

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content:
See the "Notes" field above which explains the discrepancy:

Notes:
Original data provided by the Bain News Service on the negatives or caption cards: Keating, Yanks.
Corrected title and date based on research by the Pictorial History Committee, Society for American Baseball Research, 2006.
